actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to establish the National Commission on Major League Baseball, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Commission on Major League Baseball Act of 1994

summary.text: National Commission on Major League Baseball Act of 1994 - Establishes the National Commission on Major League Baseball to oversee and regulate specified business aspects of major league baseball. Instructs the Commission to report to the Congress on the need for continuing the antitrust exemption for major league baseball and the possible effects resulting from elimination of such exemption. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: National Commission on Major League Baseball Act of 1994
A bill to establish the National Commission on Major League Baseball, and for other purposes.
